resource_dependency.welcomeMessageContent: Welcome to our Clinical Office, where your health is our priority.
resource_dependency.officeInfoSchema: Database table 'office_info' with columns: id (primary key), name (string), address (text), phone (string), email (string), description (text)

function: Display general office information and a welcome message on the homepage.
static_description: The homepage features a header with the office logo referenced by 'officeLogoImage', followed by a large welcome message stating 'welcomeMessageContent'. Below this, there is a section displaying office details such as name, address, phone number, and email fetched from the 'office_info' schema. The entire page has a light cyan background and uses cadet blue for text and components.

interaction_and_states.description: As the user scrolls down, additional office highlights or testimonials fade into view smoothly.

resource_dependency.missionStatementText: Our mission is to provide compassionate and comprehensive healthcare services to every patient.
resource_dependency.aboutUsDataSchema: Database table 'about_us' with columns: id (primary key), title (string), content (text), image_path (string)

function: Present detailed information about the clinical office and its mission.
static_description: This page displays a section titled 'About Our Office' containing paragraphs of text including 'missionStatementText'. It includes images of staff members stored in 'teamPhotosDirectory'. Content is retrieved dynamically from the 'about_us' database table. Background remains light cyan with cadet blue styling applied throughout.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on team member photos reveals a modal with their professional biography.

resource_dependency.servicesDataSchema: Database table 'services' with columns: id (primary key), name (string), description (text), icon_filename (string)

function: List all medical services offered by the office.
static_description: A grid-based layout showcasing individual service cards. Each card contains an icon located at 'serviceIconsBasePath/[icon_filename]', the service name, and a brief description pulled from the 'services' database table via 'servicesListAPIEndpoint'. Page maintains a light cyan background and cadet blue accents.

interaction_and_states.description: Service cards slightly elevate and show a subtle shadow effect when hovered over.
Selecting a service card expands it to reveal more detailed information without navigating away.

resource_dependency.contactDetailsSchema: Database table 'contact_details' with columns: id (primary key), office_address (text), phone_number (string), email (string), business_hours (text)

function: Allow users to submit inquiries and display office contact details.
static_description: Two-column layout: left side hosts a contact form with fields for Name, Email, Subject, and Message which submits to 'contactFormSubmitEndpoint'; right side shows embedded map from 'officeAddressMapEmbedUrl' and contact info loaded from 'contact_details' schema. Consistent light cyan background and cadet blue theme maintained.

interaction_and_states.description: Submitting the form sends data to the backend endpoint and displays a success or error message inline.
Form fields highlight with a cadet blue border upon focus.

function: Provide consistent navigation across all website pages.
static_description: Fixed-position horizontal navigation bar at the top featuring links defined in 'navigationMenuItems'. Includes a toggle icon 'menuToggleIcon' visible only on smaller screens. Styled with cadet blue elements against a light cyan backdrop.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking menu items navigates to respective pages. Clicking the toggle icon opens/closes a mobile-friendly dropdown menu overlay.
Desktop menu items change background to a lighter shade of cyan on hover.

function: Apply a uniform light cyan background color to all web pages.
static_description: All HTML body elements across pages use CSS rule `background-color: #E0FFFF;` derived from 'backgroundColorValue'. This ensures visual consistency throughout the site.

function: Style all UI components using a consistent cadet blue color scheme.
static_description: UI components like buttons, headers, borders, and interactive elements utilize the cadet blue color '#5F9EA0' sourced from 'componentColorPalette' through CSS classes globally applied.

interaction_and_states.description: Buttons and interactive elements darken slightly in tone while maintaining the same base hue during hover states.

function: Ensure responsiveness and accessibility of all pages on various devices.
static_description: Pages adapt layouts using CSS media queries ensuring readability and usability on desktops, tablets, and smartphones. Semantic HTML tags and ARIA attributes enhance accessibility compliance.

interaction_and_states.description: Layout adjusts fluidly between breakpoints, reorganizing content stacks vertically on small screens.

resource_dependency.dynamicContentFetchPattern: Use Axios or Fetch API to retrieve JSON responses from internal REST endpoints.

function: Fetch any dynamic content exclusively through backend APIs.
static_description: Frontend JavaScript modules employ asynchronous calls matching 'dynamicContentFetchPattern' to load content from server-side routes rather than embedding static data directly in markup.

interaction_and_states.description: Upon DOMContentLoaded event, scripts automatically initiate API requests to populate dynamic sections.

function: Establish secure connection to PostgreSQL database using predefined environment variables.
static_description: Backend initializes database connections referencing configuration parameters found within 'postgresConnectionConfig', aligning precisely with provided environment variable values.

resource_dependency.repoStructureGuide: Root directory includes subdirectories named 'frontend/' and 'backend/', each housing respective project files.

function: Organize repository structure clearly separating frontend and backend codebases.
static_description: Project root contains two main folders per 'repoStructureGuide': one labeled 'frontend/' for client-side assets and another called 'backend/' for server logic, promoting clean separation of concerns.

resource_dependency.installScriptCommand: concurrently "cd frontend && npm install" "cd backend && npm install"

function: Enable unified setup of both frontend and backend dependencies using a single command.
static_description: 'package.json' defines a custom script under key 'install:all' executing 'installScriptCommand', streamlining installation of node_modules across both application layers simultaneously.

resource_dependency.devRunCommand: concurrently "cd frontend && npm start" "cd backend && npm run start-server"

function: Facilitate concurrent development execution of frontend and backend processes.
static_description: Within 'package.json', a 'dev' script invokes 'devRunCommand', launching both frontend build watcher and backend server together in parallel terminal sessions.

function: Support storage and delivery of static assets including images, stylesheets, and client-side scripts.
static_description: Dedicated directories listed in 'assetHandlingDirectories' exist in the frontend tree to house public resources served statically by the web server, enabling efficient caching and direct linking.

resource_dependency.seoMetadataSchema: Each route maps to unique <title> and <meta name="description"> tags populated with relevant keywords and summaries.

function: Optimize discoverability and search engine visibility through semantic metadata.
static_description: Every page incorporates distinct SEO metadata following guidelines in 'seoMetadataSchema', enhancing crawlability and improving organic reach performance metrics.
